# Get environmental data

```{r getEnvDataOptions, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```


```{r librariesGetData, echo = FALSE}
#library(devtools)
#options(download.file.method = "wininet") or turn off VPN
#devtools::install_github('Conte-Ecology/westBrookData/getWBData')
library(getWBData)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(validate)
library(targets)
```

Get environmental data target
```{r getEnvData}
envDataWB <- tar_read(envDataWB_Target)
str(envDataWB)
```


```{r envDataFlowGraph}
#| fig-cap: 
#|   - "Stream flow (m3/s) by river"

ggplot(envDataWB, aes(date, flow)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~river)


```

```{r envDataTemperatureGraph}
#| fig-cap: 
#|   - "Stream temperature (C) by river"

ggplot(envDataWB, aes(date, temperature)) +
  geom_point(size = 0.5) +
  facet_wrap(~river)
```
